Title: Software Engineer - React Developer
Description:
We are looking for an experienced React developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have 3+ years of experience with modern JavaScript frameworks and a passion for creating user-friendly applications.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain React applications
• Collaborate with design team on UI/UX implementation
• Write clean, maintainable code
• Participate in code reviews
• Work with REST APIs and backend integration

What We Offer:
• Competitive salary $80,000 - $120,000
• Remote work flexibility
• Health insurance and benefits
• Professional development opportunities
Requirements: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, HTML, CSS, Git, REST APIs, 3+ years experience

Title: Digital Marketing Manager
Description:
Join our growing marketing team as a Digital Marketing Manager. You'll be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies across multiple channels.

Your Role Will Include:
• Developing digital marketing campaigns across social media, email, and paid advertising
• Managing Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn advertising campaigns
• Creating content marketing strategies and managing blog content
• Analyzing campaign performance using Google Analytics and other tools
• Collaborating with sales team to generate qualified leads
• Managing marketing automation workflows in HubSpot
• Conducting A/B testing and conversion optimization

Requirements:
• 4+ years of digital marketing experience
• Proven track record of managing successful campaigns with ROI improvement
• Expert knowledge of Google Analytics, Google Ads, and social media platforms
• Experience with marketing automation tools (HubSpot preferred)
• Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field preferred

What We Offer:
• Competitive salary range: $65,000 - $90,000
• Performance bonuses based on campaign results
• Flexible work arrangements
• Professional development budget
• Health, dental, and vision insurance
Requirements: Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, HubSpot, SEO, Content Marketing, Email Marketing, 4+ years experience

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
We're seeking a Senior Data Scientist to join our analytics team and drive data-driven decision making across the organization. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in machine learning, statistical analysis, and business intelligence.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and implement machine learning models for predictive analytics
• Conduct advanced statistical analysis on large datasets
• Develop data pipelines and automated reporting systems
• Collaborate with product and business teams to identify opportunities
• Create data visualizations and dashboards using Tableau/Power BI
• Mentor junior data scientists and analysts
• Present findings to executive leadership team

Technical Requirements:
• PhD or Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
• 5+ years of experience in data science or analytics roles
• Expert proficiency in Python, R, and SQL
• Experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)
• Strong knowledge of statistical methods and experimental design
• Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
• Proficiency with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, or similar)
• Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop) preferred

Compensation:
• Salary range: $120,000 - $160,000
• Equity participation
• Comprehensive benefits package
• Remote work options
Requirements: Python, R, SQL, Machine Learning, TensorFlow, Tableau, AWS, PhD/Master's degree, 5+ years experience
